remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used for refueling associated fuel tank.

placard.para: Placard at refuel panel: "FUELING PRESELECT FEATURE INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Manually fuel aircraft starting with forward most tank(s): First (center), then next most forward tanks (2 and 3 main) and then tanks 1 and 4 last in order to prevent weight and balance concerns.

caution.para: FUEL DISTRIBUTION WILL NEED TO BE MANUALLY MONITORED.
